attributes.action: Subsidise train ticket costs so it becomes a more appealing method of travelling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I currently travel to work by car. It costs £20 a week in petrol, taking half an hour to drive there. I thought about swapping the car for a train but found it costs £40 a week and takes an hour. I don't mind extra travelling time but it equates to £160 a month - double!
